text:
Gas Legislation (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2001

An Act to amend the Gas Act 2000 and the Gas Pipelines Act 2000
[Royal Assent 17 December 2001]

Be it enacted by His Excellency the Governor of Tasmania, by and with the advice and consent of the Legislative Council and House of Assembly, in Parliament assembled, as follows:

PART 1 - Preliminary

1. Short title
    This Act may be cited as the Gas Legislation (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2001 .

2. Commencement
        (1) Section 30 commences on a day to be proclaimed.
        (2) The remaining provisions of this Act commence on the day on which this Act receives the Royal Assent.

PART 2 - Gas Act 2000 Amended

3.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Gas Act 2000 .

4.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Gas Act 2000 .

PART 3 - Gas Pipelines Act 2000 Amended

28. Principal Act
    In this Part, the Gas Pipelines Act 2000 is referred to as the Principal Act.

29.
    The amendments effected by this section have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Gas Pipelines Act 2000 .

[Uncommenced

30. Section 3 amended (Interpretation)
    Section 3 of the Principal Act is amended by inserting after subsection (3) the following subsections:
            (4) Where –
                    (a) an order under subsection (3) would have the effect that a supply pipeline is to be treated as a transmission pipeline for the purposes of this Act; and
                    (b) there is in force an exclusive franchise under section 30 of the Gas Act 2000 in respect of the area in which the supply pipeline is situated –
            the Governor is not to make the order unless the person to whom the exclusive franchise has been granted consents to the order.
            (5) The consent of a person to whom an exclusive franchise has been granted under section 30 of the Gas Act 2000 is only required under subsection (4) during the period of that exclusive franchise.

]

31.
    The amendments effected by this section have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Gas Pipelines Act 2000 .

32.
    The amendments effected by this section have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Gas Pipelines Act 2000 .

33.
    The amendment effected by this section has been incorporated into the authorised version of the Gas Pipelines Act 2000 .

34.
    The amendments effected by this section have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Gas Pipelines Act 2000 .

35.
    See Schedule 1 .

36.
    See Schedule 2 .

SCHEDULE 1 - Substitution of "certified" for "validated"

The amendments effected by Section 35 and this Schedule have been incorporated into authorised versions of the following Acts:
        (a) Gas Act 2000 ;
        (b) Gas Pipelines Act 2000 .

SCHEDULE 2 - Substitution of "certification" for "validation"

The amendments effected by Section 36 and this Schedule have been incorporated into authorised versions of the following Acts:
        (a) Gas Act 2000 ;
        (b) Gas Pipelines Act 2000 .
